name: Abraham Ford
info:
• 简体中文名: 亚伯拉罕·福特
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: http://walkingdead.wikia.com/wiki/Abraham_Ford_(TV_Series)
  • 男: Michael Cudlitz
detail: Not much is known about Abraham's life before or as the outbreak started, apart that he had a wife, daughter, and son. He was a Sergeant in the U.S. Army and is described as "vulgar with rough edges but wise". Abraham is single-minded, proud, brave, sometimes short-tempered and has also a brutal side. He was stationed somewhere near Houston, Texas. He also had a messy encounter with a camel that resulted in it literally getting blown up.
